Reviews.Title: Kidz Cam Digital Camera Kit
Reviews.Author: wendy
Reviews.Content: Not a good camera for kids... Was given as a gift to my granddaughter and she still has not been able to take pics...The shipping and handling was great...

Reviews.Title: Kids Cam Camera
Reviews.Author: Rachel "XxCuddlesXx"
Reviews.Content: I got this this camera as a gift in 2008. I thought it was the best gift ever, so I started to record a whole bunch of videos. It never took good pictures either, it was always blur. After a year or so, this camera got ruined. I can't not even record videos, even when I take pictures I can't even see them because when I plug it in my laptop, it won't go through. Yes, the program is great, I play the games it has but, the point that I cannot even record videos or even take pictures, it's not worth it. I don't know if it will work for you, but, I just hope it does because mines didn't for me. Besides, I didn't even buy it in the first place, I got it as a a gift, so no money was wasted.

ProductInfo.Features: Digital camera stores up to 152 pictures. Features include: photo editing slide-show player storymaker game center
ProductInfo.Name: Kidz Cam Digital Camera Kit
